SongRequest.title: SongRequest
SongRequest.description: Represents a song request submitted by a student.

id.description: Unique identifier for the song request.

studentId.description: Reference to the Student who submitted the request.

studentName.description: Denormalized name of the student for easy display.

karaokeUrl.description: URL to the karaoke video for the song.

submissionDate.description: Date and time when the song request was submitted (server timestamp).

status.description: Current status of the song request.

Student.title: Student
Student.description: Represents a student who can submit song requests.

id.description: Unique identifier for the student (matches Firebase Auth UID).

/students/{studentId}.description: Stores student profiles. Each document represents a student who can submit song requests.

/song_requests/{songRequestId}.description: Stores all song requests in a single collection for easier querying and sorting by admins.
